intro:
To protect your future , I will become stronger.
The legendary visual RPG is revived here!
description:
The "Cosmic Fantasy" series, which shocked fans by being one of the first CD-ROM games to use animation to depict crucial scenes, is making a comeback on Nintendo Switch™ after more than 30 years!
 This visual RPG evokes a sense of nostalgia while also feeling fresh and new.

A hugely popular game with devoted fans
Set in space, this RPG was released for PC Engine CD-ROM² and Mega-CD between 1990 and 1994.
 At the time, RPGs featuring animated cutscenes were rare, and its world-building, character individuality, and story gained a fervent following, making it a hugely popular title.

A pioneering RPG that incorporated visual scenes
The series is famous for being a pioneering RPG that used animated visual scenes for key moments. 
This groundbreaking expression method was one of the first to adopt animation-style direction, which is now commonplace, and its high-quality execution remains impressive today.

In the second installment of the series, a profound and heartrending story unfolds...
Planet Idea, a beautiful star brimming with rich nature and peace. However, the sinister machinations of the dark sorcerer Garam, who seeks to take control of Idea, are steadily progressing! 
This is the poignant yet brave tale of the young boy Ban's adventure.
